assetsFeature1Bubble1: Q) Wish I could easily manage supplies using a barcode!
assetsFeature1Bubble1Mobile:
Q) Wish I could easily manage
supplies using a barcode!
assetsFeature1Bubble2:
A) Efficiently manage by scanning
barcodes with Label Print menu on
BoxHero.
assetsFeature1Bubble2Mobile:
A) Efficiently manage by
scanning barcodes with Label
Print menu on BoxHero.
assetsFeature1RightDesc1: Print barcodes on any size or kind of paper with Label Print menu.
assetsFeature1RightDesc2: BoxHero supports barcode customization including item information and can be printed into barcode or QR code format.
assetsFeature1RightDesc3: For items with barcodes already attached, simply register on BoxHero and import the data when you need it.
assetsFeature2Bubble1:
Q) Is there a simple way to find out who, when
and in what quantity of inventory was taken?
assetsFeature2Bubble1Mobile:
Q) Is there a simple way to find out
who, when and in what quantity of
inventory was taken?
assetsFeature2Bubble2:
A) It is easy to view all transactions that
are accurately recorded in History.
assetsFeature2Bubble2Mobile:
A) It is easy to view all
transactions that are accurately
recorded in History.
assetsFeature2RightDesc1: Keep every single transaction by making Stock in/out on mobile.
assetsFeature2RightDesc2: Find only the information you need by filtering it as items, members, etc., and you can download the search history in spreadsheet.
assetsFeature2RightDesc3: Assign roles for each member to restrict menus such as adding item, making stock in, etc..
assetsFeature3Bubble1: Q) Can't I view the number of stocks we had in the past?
assetsFeature3Bubble1Mobile:
Q) Can't I view the number of
stocks we had in the past?
assetsFeature3Bubble2:
A) You can accurately check the past
quantity status by selecting a period.
assetsFeature3Bubble2Mobile:
A) You can accurately check the
past quantity status by selecting
a period.
assetsFeature3RightDesc1: View inventory status of a specific date from the past.
assetsFeature3RightDesc2: When processing accountings for assets, checking past transactions become helpful for clear analysis.
assetsFeature3RightDesc3: Current stock quantity for selected dates can be downloaded as a spreadsheet
assetsTopDesc:
Accurately manage supplies and consumables anytime, anywhere
without paper or spreadsheet.
assetsTopTitle:
BoxHero is a Full-featured Inventory Management Solution
for Easy Asset Management
assetsTopTitleMobile:
BoxHero is a Full-featured Inventory Management Solution
for Easy Asset Management
closingMsg: Try out more features of BoxHero right now.
materialFeature1Bubble1: Q) Can I manage all types of materials?
materialFeature1Bubble1Mobile:
Q) Can I manage all types of
materials?
materialFeature1Bubble2:
A) You can manage all types of materials
such as cars, medicals, interiors,
equipment, constructions, and more on
BoxHero.
materialFeature1Bubble2Mobile:
A) You can manage all types of
materials such as cars,
medicals, interiors, equipment,
constructions, and more on
BoxHero.
materialFeature1RightDesc1: Adding categories for lot no., dimension, and other information to better manage parts/material is available.
materialFeature1RightDesc2: Identify items easily by adding a photo to your items.
materialFeature1RightDesc3: View inventory at a glance by grouping items with the same information.
materialFeature2Bubble1:
Q) Wouldn't it be difficult to train our employees on
how to use the service?
materialFeature2Bubble1Mobile:
Q) Wouldn't it be difficult to train our
employees on how to use the service?
materialFeature2Bubble2:
A) BoxHero is a simple inventory
management service even for beginners.
materialFeature2Bubble2Mobile:
A) BoxHero is a simple inventory
management service even for
beginners.
materialFeature2LeftDesc:
Complex inventory
process is finally
easy and convenient.
materialFeature2RightDesc1: Easy to process simple stock in/out anytime, anywhere from your smartphone.
materialFeature2RightDesc2: Add past missing transactions and leave memo for any reminders to keep.
materialFeature2RightDesc3: All history remains even if a transaction is deleted or edited, it's accurate to track inventories.
materialFeature3Bubble1:
Q) I wish to know ahead of time before the
materials run out.
materialFeature3Bubble1Mobile:
Q) I wish to know ahead of time
before the materials run out.
materialFeature3Bubble2:
A) Get a reminder before your stock runs
out by setting a minimum quantity of
each material.
materialFeature3Bubble2Mobile:
A) Get a reminder before your
stock runs out by setting a
minimum quantity of each
material.
materialFeature3LeftDesc:
Receive push notifications
from BoxHero when running
low stock.
materialFeature3RightDesc1: Set a minimum quantity to check low stock, overstock, etc. for each material/part.
materialFeature3RightDesc2: Check the item's low stock to excess stock status at once with BoxHero's auto-calculation.
materialFeature3RightDesc3: Push notifications are sent every morning at 9 AM from BoxHero app when your stock is running low.
materialTopDesc:
Easily manage material and parts,
and share accurate histories with your teammates.
materialTopTitle:
BoxHero is an All-in-one Solution for
Efficient Material Management.
materialTopTitleMobile:
BoxHero is an All-in-one Solution for
Efficient Material Management.
salesFeature1Bubble1: Q) Could I manage based on the items I handle?
salesFeature1Bubble1Mobile:
Q) Could I manage based on
the items I handle?
salesFeature1Bubble2:
A) You can manage all types of items you
sell, including all goods, food, cosmetics,
clothes, electronic devices, and others.
salesFeature1Bubble2Mobile:
A) You can manage all types of
items you sell, including all
goods, food, cosmetics, clothes,
electronic devices, and others.
salesFeature1LeftDesc:
Enter only the
necessary information
for your item.
salesFeature1RightDesc1: Enter information related to your items by adding categories as brand, category, size, and color.
salesFeature1RightDesc2: Grouping items by category makes it easier to find sold products.
salesFeature1RightDesc3: Register by item photo and enhance inventory visualization.
salesFeature2Bubble1: Q) Can I manage orders and sales at the same time?
salesFeature2Bubble1Mobile:
Q) Can I manage orders and sales at
the same time?
salesFeature2Bubble2:
A) BoxHero provides features that suit
order and sales management with an
automatic inventory integration.
salesFeature2Bubble2Mobile:
A) BoxHero provides features
that suit order and sales
management with an automatic
inventory integration.
salesFeature2LeftDesc:
The process of
Order → Stock In
Sales → Stock Out is smooth.
salesFeature2RightDesc1: Quickly create purchase orders and invoices by entering a price or importing saved unit costs.
salesFeature2RightDesc2: Printing invoice is available. Stock in and out may be processed immediately based on order and sales history.
salesFeature2RightDesc3: Created purchase orders and invoices are directly saved and can be viewed anytime.
salesFeature3BottomDesc:
Easy to make barcode that fits your business perfectly.
Labels can be printed in a barcode or QR code form.
salesFeature3Bubble1: Q) I wish to improve my inventory accuracy.
salesFeature3Bubble1Mobile:
Q) I wish to improve my
inventory accuracy.
salesFeature3Bubble2:
A) Manage your inventory accurately yet
efficiently by scanning a barcode.
salesFeature3Bubble2Mobile:
A) Manage your inventory
accurately yet efficiently by
scanning a barcode.
salesFeature3RightDesc1: Scan barcodes to view status and make transactions.
salesFeature3RightDesc2: Barcode scan is both available via BoxHero mobile app's camera or any barcode scanner.
salesFeature3RightDesc3: No barcodes? Don't worry! You can generate and print barcodes in BoxHero.
salesFeature4Bubble1: Q) How do I know if my business is doing well?
salesFeature4Bubble1Mobile:
Q) How do I know if my business
is doing well?
salesFeature4Bubble2:
A) BoxHero provides automatic inventory
analysis data such as profit, purchase
information, and more.
salesFeature4Bubble2Mobile:
A) BoxHero provides automatic
inventory analysis data such as
profit, purchase information,
and more.
salesFeature4LeftDesc:
Let BoxHero do
the complex
analysis for you.
salesFeature4RightDesc1: Convenient to analyze sales such as profit, purchase price, and more.
salesFeature4RightDesc2: Check various inventory data like inventory turnover ratio or add formulas to customize the data you want.
salesFeature4RightDesc3: Receive a weekly report of your last week’s inventory status right in your email inbox.
salesTopDesc:
Manage all sales-related processes
to save time and focus on growing your business.
salesTopTitle:
BoxHero is an All-in-one Solution that is
Perfectly Optimized for Sales
